city.name: City to visit: Paris, France
city.description: Paris, France's capital, is a major European city and a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy and culture. Its 19th-century cityscape is crisscrossed by wide boulevards and the River Seine. Beyond such landmarks as the Eiffel Tower and the 12th-century, Gothic Notre-Dame cathedral, the city is known for its cafe culture and designer boutiques along the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honor√©.

phrases.englishPhrase: This is the most beautiful city I have ever been to.
phrases.foreignLanguage: C'est la plus belle ville que je connaisse.

favouriteSubjects.name: Information Portals
favouriteSubjects.description: A website that provides a significant amount of information on a topic.

favouriteSubjects.name: Knowledge Economy
favouriteSubjects.description: It foster social cohesiveness and educate individuals to become and remain effective workers and engaged citizens.

favouriteSubjects.name: Information Management
favouriteSubjects.description: The collection, storage, curation, dissemination, archiving and destruction of documents, images, drawings and others sources of information.

favouriteSubjects.name: Business Management
favouriteSubjects.description: The purpose of this module is to introduce students to both the theories and contemporary practices of Global Business Management and its dynamics in a strategic approach to managing business organisations that operate across borders.

favouriteSubjects.name: Social Media Management
favouriteSubjects.description: The ongoing process of creating and scheduling content designed to grow and nurture an audience across social media platforms.

favouriteSubjects.name: Search Engine Optimisation
favouriteSubjects.description: This Specialization will teach you to optimize website content for the best possible search engine ranking.
